points.text: Used Angular and SCSS to develop and update front-end components, adhering to strict styling standards.
Used Oracle PL/SQL to create Data Reports and Extracts
Created automation scripts with Python and JavaScript to reduce number of clicks required by 10 per report
Developing a web application for the analysis and presentation of experimental SAS data
Achieved 100X faster compute time of select elements
Using Flask, Bootstrap, NumPy, SciPy, and Matplotlib
Responsible for lab instruction, marking, and holding office hours for 3 core undergraduate courses
